caption: A dreamy indie pop track with shimmering synth pads, gentle acoustic guitar arpeggios, and soft female vocals. The production features reverb-drenched harmonies and a subtle electronic beat, creating an ethereal atmosphere perfect for late-night contemplation.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
City lights blur through the window pane
I trace your name in the morning rain
Memories float like dust in the air
I reach for you but you're not there

[Pre-Chorus]
We were young and we were free
Now you're just a ghost to me

[Chorus]
Fading photographs on my wall
I still hear your voice in the hall
Time moves on but I'm standing still
Guess I always will, guess I always will

[Verse 2]
Your favorite song plays on the radio
I turn it up then I let it go
Some things change and some things stay
But you're the one that got away

[Pre-Chorus]
We were young and we were free
Now you're just a ghost to me

[Chorus]
Fading photographs on my wall
I still hear your voice in the hall
Time moves on but I'm standing still
Guess I always will, guess I always will

[Bridge]
Maybe in another life
We could get the timing right

[Outro]
Fading, fading away
